column1: # Based on Arduino default_16MB.csv with optimizations for LVGL graphics
# Compatible with OTA updates and large graphics assets
# - NVS:         20 KB  - Non-volatile storage for WiFi
# - OTA Data:     8 KB  - OTA selection data
# - App1:      6.25 MB  - Secondary application for OTA
# - SPIFFS:    3.38 MB  - File system for assets
# - CoreDump:    64 KB  - Crash dump storage for debugging
